recipes.title: Chow Mein
recipes.description: While slices of Chinese sausage are good in any stir-fry, my favorite way to use them is in a rice or noodle dish, so the
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste

recipes.title: Fried Rice
ingredientLines: 2 or 3 links of chineses sausage, cut into 1/4 inch slices
Finely chopped green onion or cilantro

recipes.title: Black Pepper Chicken
recipes.description: The sweet heat from the Chinese five-spice powder may not be what you typically think of in terms of incendiary wings, and the crisp skin comes from the blast of a hot oven rather than the splattering of hot oil. Yet we’re quite, quite taken with them all the same. Wingdings for dinner.
ingredientLines: 40 chicken wing pieces, or 20 whole chicken wings
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves
1/4 cup light or regular sour cream
Juice 1/2 lemon (or why not try lime?)

recipes.title: Kung Pao Chicken
recipes.description: A superquick family favourite - fab for barbeques.
ingredientLines: 1.0 tbsp vinegar (you can use cider, malt or wine)

recipes.title: Grilled Teriyaki Chicken
recipes.description: Rice cake, called tteok in Korean, is a much-loved traditional dish with many many variations. No festival day, anniversary, or celebrations is complete without them. They are very chewy, and may be an acquired taste, but once you get hooked you'll crave them all the time.
ingredientLines: 6 to 8 fresh long rice cake sticks, or 20 smaller rice cake sticks
3 to 4 tablespoons light soy sauce, depending on saltiness

recipes.title: Mushroom Chicken
recipes.description: Don’t let the name scare you. It’s a really simple dessert — usually made with a base of cake mix + fruit filling — where, true to its name, you can dump the ingredients into a pan, give it a stir, and bake.
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

recipes.title: Five Flavor Shrimp
recipes.description: To be served warm, when they're nice and chewy, with jam or with strawberries and cream. When cooled and left unadorned, they become crisp and buttery sugar cookies.
ingredientLines: 2 1/2 cups self-rising white lily or cake flour

recipes.title: Crispy Shrimp
ingredientLines: 1 tbsp butter for creamed chanterelle mushroom sauce
Salt and freshly ground black pepp

recipes.title: Beijing BeefTM
recipes.description: The resulting candy corn slurry is certainly one of those dishes that straddles the line between awful and awesome: that is to say, you might just like it, but you probably wouldn't confess that to your foodie friends.
ingredientLines: 1 cup cream or half and half

recipes.title: Buttermilk Creams with Strawberries
recipes.description: Whipped cream gives these no-bake eggless custards a delicate texture. Don't worry if the mixture forms clumps at first -- it will come together with gentle folding.
